Job Title: Financial Planning and Analysis Manager

Location: Metro Detroit, MI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Analyst, Management

Description:
A great UHY client is seeking a Manager of FP&A to join their team. The ideal candidate will have 4 years of experience in consulting or public accounting (or related), advanced Excel skills, and a thorough understanding of financial statements and 3-statement modeling.
The Manager of FP&A role is a remote role. This is a client direct hire position.
